org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.version.impl

Class ManifestVersionInfoSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.version.impl.ManifestVersionInfoSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VersionInfoSource, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Component
public class ManifestVersionInfoSource
extends Object
implements VersionInfoSource, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    This class can be used to determine versions of application modules. The version information is retrieved from manifest files (MANIFEST.MF) that are available at classpath (JAR) and at servlet context path (WAR).
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Michal Palicka

      • getVersionInformation

        public VersionInfo[] getVersionInformation(@Nullable
                                  VersionInfo filter)
        Retrieves version information from all manifests that are available at classpath. In many cases, the manifest attributes are not properly set and the version information may be incomplete. The method allows to specify a filter that can be used to remove invalid entries from the result.

        The filter is also an instance of VersionInfo, but its fields are expected to contain regular expressions instead of plain values. Each available version entry is matched against patterns in the filter (field-by-field). If any of the fields does not match, the version entry is excluded from the result.

        If the filter is null, all entries are returned.

        If a field in the filter is set to null, then all values are allowed.

        Specified by:
        getVersionInformation in interface VersionInfoSource
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter used to remove invalid or unwanted entries.
        Returns:
        an array of version entries (in ascending order).
